name: Tune Ring
description:
Tune Ring is an exciting rhythm game that you can play on your Android device. With its advanced auto-creation feature, the game allows you to create custom beatmaps from any MP3 file of your choice. You can set the difficulty and background image to customize your beatmaps and make them even more unique.

The game is simple to play but challenging to master. To play, you hold two buttons located at the left and right side of your screen to move the drumset, which is your object to control in the game. Additionally, you can tilt your phone to move the drumset faster in the direction of the tilt. The aim of the game is to hit the note or hit object, which appears at the top of the screen and runs down. You need to move the drumset to hit the notes accurately to score points.

Tune Ring is an excellent game to play with friends. You can connect with your friends via the same wifi network and compete with them for the highest score. The game also features different levels of difficulty, from easy to hard, to cater to players of different skill levels.

Overall, Tune Ring is an immersive rhythm game that provides an engaging and fun gaming experience for players of all ages. With its auto-creation feature, customization options, and multiplayer mode, the game offers endless hours of entertainment.
